About the Product:
Amul is synonymous with butter in India. Several generations of Indian consumers have grown up with the taste of Amul Butter for six decades. The utterly butterly delicious taste of Amul Butter is a must on the breakfast table of almost every Indian household. The utterly cute Amul Butter Girl has been a part of Indian consumers since 1950. Amul Butter topical is recognised as one of the longest-running advertisement campaigns in the world.Creamy Amul Pasteurised Butter, a hallmark of perfection in every spread. Crafted from the finest milk, its rich, smooth texture melts effortlessly on warm toast or enriches culinary creations with a luxurious touch. Elevate every meal with the unmistakable taste of Amul, cherished for its unmatched quality and wholesome goodness.

About the Product:
Prepare delicious paneer recipes whenever the craving strikes with this ready-to-cook malai paneer from one of India's most loved and trusted dairy brands, Amul. It's the easiest way to cook paneer and provides protein and calcium. So if you're a big paneer fan, make sure you always have it stocked in your refrigerator! This ready-to-cook malai paneer from Amul is similar to cream cottage cheese. It's available diced in 100 grams, 200 grams, 500 grams, and 1 kg packaging, and in block form in 200 grams and 1 kg packaging. Amul Malai Paneer has a higher fat content and lower moisture content compared to loose paneer available in the market. This makes it easy to cook in less time, making it perfect for students and young professionals who don't always have too much time. Opt for the diced packet of Amul Malai Paneer if you like to have a sense of uniformity when you're cooking. It has a smooth, soft, and uniform texture. Amul Malai Paneer is made from pure and hygienic sources and has a shelf life of up to six months when stored frozen.

The cubic shapes of Amul Processed Cheese Chiplets make it perfect for parties. They are best served with pineapple dices, and to add some zing, you can sprinkle some chaat masala over the cubes. This nutritious product from the House of Amul is rich in milk proteins and calcium. Although these cheese cubes add something more to your party platter, you can also grate the cheese and add it to your sauce or soup to make it creamier and thicker. A versatile dressing, Amul Cheese Cubes are used in the preparation of sandwiches and salads, and as a filling in wraps, rolls, tacos, etc. It is perfect for adding an exquisite flavour and aroma to Paranthas, Rotis, Naan, etc.
How to Use:
There are probably thousands of ways in which you can use cheese; a cheese lover will actually invent ways to include cheese in his or her diet. You can use it in your sauce, soup, pizza, pasta, casserole, and even omelettes because Amul cheese cubes melt easily. It is impossible to think of mashed potatoes or lasagne or a souffle without cheese. A number of specialty desserts like chocolate cheesecake also need its dash of cheese. And if you want, you can simply pair up the cubes with diced fruits like pears and apples.

product_desc: Everyday Dairy Whitener - Milk Powder For Tea
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Nestle Everyday is a dairy whitener or dried milk powder that mixes in completely with your tea to enhance its taste, providing a thicker and tastier cup of tea every time. Nestle uses the highest quality milk and international dairy expertise to carefully dry and balance this milk powder without losing any of its goodness, allowing you and your family to enjoy a richer, creamier, and tastier cup of tea - with Everyday as the perfect partner! Did you know that Everyday is the number 1 selling dairy whitener in the country? It's no wonder then that in blind taste tests, consumers ranked tea made with Everyday milk powder as their number 1 choice for a perfect cup of tea!
How to Use:
Usage: 1 tsp. Nestle Everyday dairy whitener + 3 tsp. lukewarm water.Stir. Add this to brewed tea, add sugar to taste, stir, and enjoy.Serving Suggestion: 1 tablespoon + tea leaves + 100ml water.
Storage:
After opening, transfer the contents into an airtight container to avoid lumping.Store in a cool, dry, and hygienic place. Safety Warning:This product is not to be used as a motherâ€™s milk substitute.
Features:
A tea enhancer milk powder that mixes in completely with your tea to enhance its taste.Get a thicker and tastier cup of tea every time with Everyday powder.Nestle Everyday dairy whitener ranked number 1 by consumers in blind taste tests!Comes with added sugar to make the perfect cup of tea.

From the Brand:
About the ProductPaneer is a popular Indian dairy product made by curdling milk with a food acid like lemon juice or vinegar. It has a firm texture and a mild, creamy taste, making it versatile for various culinary uses. Commonly used in Indian cuisine, paneer can be cooked in a variety of ways, including frying, grilling, and adding to curries. It absorbs flavours well, making it an ideal ingredient in both savoury and sweet dishes. Paneer is enjoyed fresh and in numerous traditional recipes.
How to Use:
Paneer is versatile! Use them in curries, sauté with veggies, or grill for skewers. Toss in salads, stuff parathas, or make Paneer tikka. Options are endless – explore and enjoy!

About the Product:
Epigamia, which means in Ancient Greek a way to formalie the relationship between different nations, offers Greek yoghurt that is one of the most authentic yoghurts advocating a healthy lifestyle with a delicious taste. The creamy, rich texture enables it to be nutritionally dense and satisfying. Yoghurt is a source of iodine, which helps to increase metabolism and promote weight loss. It is lower in lactose as well as carbohydrates, making it much easier to digest. Strawberry pulp and lemon juice concentrate are added to Greek Yoghurt to make the delicious Strawberry Greek Yogurt. All natural, no preservatives, no added colours or flavours, high protein, low fat. Pasteurised double-toned milk was used. Active live cultures S Thermophilus, L Bacillus Delbrueckii Subsp Bulgaricus added. Fruit Content: 9%; Contains added natural flavour (Strawberry); Contains permitted natural colours: Beetroot and black carrot concentrate.

About the Product:
Of all the things the Greeks have given us, democracy and yoghurt take the top spots. While the former is of no use when you're hungry, a cup of Epigamia Greek yoghurt is just perfect. Epigamia was the term used for marriage between two city-states in ancient Greece. We have adopted this word to talk about our celebration of the marriage of health and taste in our products; healthy preservative-free snacks that help you find your happy balance! Our journey started with us wanting to contemporise tradition by creating innovative items that have classic ingredients with modern twists thrown in. We wanted to push boundaries to create something new but familiar. Our Greek Yogurt is an example of this. 
It has all the healthy goodness of homemade dahi, with the added punch of high protein and zero preservatives. Taking forward this love we have for innovation, we daresay we've done it again! Introducing the first No Added Sugar Greek Yogurt in India. 
Made with real ingredients and no preservatives, this strawberry yoghurt brings together the classic pairing of strawberries and cream, with ripe strawberries and thick yoghurt creating a timeless combination. Zero preservatives, high protein, real fruit content and no added sugar make this a great snack to beat the everyday hunger pangs. Give it a try and tell us what you think!
Pasteurized double toned milk used. Active Live Cultures S Thermophilus, L Bacillus, Delbrueckii Subsp, Bulgaricus  added. Fruit Content : 9%; Contains added natural flavour (Strawberry).
Contains permitted natural colours : Beetroot concentrate
Weight: 120 g
Keep it refrigerated at 4 to 8 Deg C.
Ingredients:
Greek Yoghurt (pasteurized Double Toned Milk, Milk Solids, Stabilising Agent (Pectin Ins 440), Permitted Starter Cultures), The Processed Strawberry Pulp (Strawberry Puree, De-ionised Apple, Water, Steviol Glycosides (ins 960), Salt, Lemon Juice Concentrate).
Nutritional Facts:
89.4 kcal / 100 gm
Good for gut health.
Aids digestion.
Boosts Immunity.
Berries have low sugar and anti-aging qualities.
How to Use:
Eat on the go.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
SOFIT is your perfect partner for a balanced diet and an active lifestyle. When you feel fit from the inside, you feel fab on the outside. SOFIT is vegan, naturally lactose-free, naturally gluten-free and preservative-free drink that makes it a perfect addition for a healthy lifestyle. It is composed of plant protein, dietary fibers, vitamins A, E and B12, and calcium.
SOFIT Soya Drink has the goodness of plant protein which fills up your protein intake up to 11% of daily protein requirement through one serving (200ml). One serving of 200 ml of SOFIT Soya Drink is equivalent to one glass of 200 ml cow’s milk! SOFIT Soya Drink contains dietary fiber from plant sources which helps in healthy digestion. SOFIT Soya Drink comes in 4 indulgent and exciting flavours- Chocolate, Vanilla, Kesar Pista and Naturally Sugar-Free. In fact, SOFIT can also be used in recipes to make them wholesome.

About the Product:
Dish up the most amazing sweet treats with this whipping cream from Amul. Whether you're a newbie baker or a professional one, you will love this whipping cream for your favourite recipes. It's the first made in India packaged whipping cream from none other than the most loved and trusted dairy brand Amul. You can use this whipping cream in your recipes or add it as a topping on your favourite desserts, milk shakes and cold coffee. It's the tastiest addition to your fruit salad. If you have a birthday celebration coming up, stock up on lots of Amul Whipping Cream because it's a must in almost every other baked treats recipe! product_USP: Fat Free, Natural Source of Calcium & Protein
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Nestle A+ Slim Milk is a step towards staying fit and looking great. Choosing a low-fat diet and engaging in physical activities such as using the stairs, jogging, and cycling can help you achieve your fitness goals. Enjoy the delicious low-fat Slim Milk with 0.2% fat in every 200 ml glass. Including low-fat products in your daily diet can help you maintain your calorie intake. Nestle Slim Milk offers the same goodness as regular milk with 95% less fat compared to cow or buffalo milk. This UHT Treated Skimmed Milk, rich in Calcium and Protein, has no added preservatives. This milk undergoes 61 stringent quality checks, including checks for adulterants, aflatoxin, and antibiotics, and is packed in a 6-layer packaging to provide 100% protection against adulteration.
How to Use:
Usage: Nestle A+ Milk can be consumed straight from the pack, no boiling required. This pack contains 4 servings. Warning: This product is not to be used as an infant milk substitute. Do not buy if the pack is puffed.
Storage:
Store in a cool, dry, and hygienic place.After opening, refrigerate between 4-8 degrees Celsius and use within 2 days.
Features:
Nestle A+ Slim Milk offers the same goodness as milk with 95% less fat*.Undergoes 61 stringent quality checks.Every 200ml glass contains 0.2% fat to help maintain your calorie intake.UHT treated skimmed milk contains no added preservatives and is a natural source of calcium & protein.This slim milk can be consumed directly from the carton, no boiling required.

About the Product:
As the name suggests, Amul Mithai Mate is indeed the best friend for your desserts. This sweet thickener is now made with skimmed milk so that you have fewer calories in your sweet dish. There are probably thousands of recipes which have Amul Mithai Mate as its key ingredient. Whether you are making kheer, thandai, coconut ladoos, or white fudge, you simply cannot do without this smooth, creamy sweetened condensed milk.
How to Use:
There are probably thousands of desserts, both Indian and Continental, which can be prepared with Amul Mithai Mate. Some of the popular sweet dishes are gajar ka halwa (carrot sweet dish), cakes, biscuits, toffees, rasmalai, chhanar payesh (or sweet pudding made with Indian cottage cheese), and even chocolates. If you like your tea and coffee strong, you can use it directly in your tea and coffee to whiten the liquid.

About the Product:
Yakult Light is a probiotic fermented milk drink with reduced sugar and Vitamin D and E. Every bottle contains more than 6.5 billion beneficial bacterias called Lactobacillus casei strain Shirota (LcS). LcS reaches the intestine alive to increase good bacteria and decrease bad bacteria.
Regular consumption of Yakult Light helps improve digestion and helps build immunity.
It is believed that Vitamin D helps absorb calcium and supports bone strength, and Vitamin E helps prevent aging due to antioxidant effect.

Water, Sugar, Skimmed Milk Powder, Glucose, Stabilizer (Pectin), Sweetener (Steviol Glycoside), Vitamin E,Vitamin D, Probiotic-Lactobacillus casei strain Shirota (LCS), CONTAINS NATURAL & NATURAL IDENTICAL FLAVOURSThis Contains Steviol Glycoside.CONTAIN NON-CALORIC SWEETENERALLERGEN INFORMATION: CONTAINS MILK

This refreshing milk-based drink comes to the rescue when you're feeling hungry but don't have any snacks handy. Lassi is a traditional Indian drink that has been loved in homes for generations. It is a particular favourite during the hot months but can be enjoyed all year round. India's most loved and trusted dairy brand makes this classic Indian beverage available in an easy-to-use tetrapak form. Amul Lassi is a vegetarian product made of toned milk, dahi, sugar, and water with permitted stabilizers and flavours. It is available in different sizes and packaging types: 1 litre and 200 ml Tetrapak, 200 ml PET bottle, and 250 ml Edge Pack Tetrapak.

product_desc: Lactose Free Toned Milk - UHT Sterilized, Easy To Digest
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Milky Mist Lactose-free toned milk is a research-based lactose milk to meet the requirements of consumers who can't digest milk. A majority of people can't digest milk due to the lactose present in it. They are lactose intolerant and suffer from stomach pain, bloating, diarrhoea, indigestion and constipation after consuming milk. Lactose is a natural carbohydrate present in milk. This milk has pre-digested lactose thus making it consumable by lactose intolerant people too. Hence making this switch will help them live a healthier life and consume milk without any worries. Can consume it as is with sugar or even make milkshakes and smoothies. Can also add it to your favourite cereals and make your breakfast healthier. It has all the nutrients found in milk like calcium, phosphorus, vitamin D, and protein. They are crucial for healthy bones. Protein is essential for maintaining or gaining lean muscle mass and mending bodily structures. Thus it is beneficial to add milk to our diet in some form or the other. So purchase this Lactose-free toned milk exclusively on Big Basket and have it delivered right to your doorstep. Add it to your diet and live a healthier life.

Milk, Milk Solids, Enzyme (Beta Galactosidase).

About the Product:
Modern Hi Fibre Brown Bread is made with significant amounts of whole grain flour and usually wheat. It is considered much healthier than white bread. The whole wheat flour bread provides fibre, protein, vitamin E and B, magnesium, manganese, iron, phosphorus, potassium, and zinc. It is the most common type of bread used to make sandwiches other than white sandwich bread. It is very healthy and safe to add to your daily diet. This bread is high in fibre and other nutrients compared to other white breads. It is made using natural ingredients and is free from any preservatives.

product_USP: Rich In Calcium & Vitamins, Dairy Free, No Preservatives, Gluten & Lactose Free
about_the_product:
About the Product:
So Good Almond Beverage Chocolate is a deliciously nutritious plant-based beverage crafted from the finest almonds and premium imported cocoa powder. This combination ensures a perfect blend of wellness and taste. Dairy-free, lactose-free, and gluten-free, it stands as an ideal choice for those embracing a healthy lifestyle. Enjoy it on its own or incorporate it into your smoothies, shakes, and desserts for a versatile and satisfying experience. With 50% fewer calories (compared to toned milk), it provides 30% of your daily calcium and 15% of vitamin (B series) requirements per serving, making it THE SOGOOD beverage. Make it a part of your daily routine and FEELSOGOOD.


DELICIOUSLY NUTRITIOUS - So Good Almond Beverage Chocolate utilizes the finest almonds and the best-imported cocoa powder to deliver a perfect fusion of goodness and the richness of almonds with the delightful taste of chocolate.


ONE STOP SOLUTION TO HEALTHY EATING: With 50% fewer calories than regular toned milk, 40% less sugar than milkshakes, and approximately 5 almonds per serving, So Good Almond Beverage Chocolate is an excellent choice for you and your family. Start your mornings right with our Almond Beverage Chocolate – a delightful combination of health and taste that ensures stress-free mornings for you and a nourishing treat for your kids.


HIGH IN CALCIUM AND VITAMINS - So Good Almond Beverage Chocolate stands as a nutritional powerhouse, being high in calcium and a source of Vitamin B series and Vitamin D. Providing 30% of your daily calcium requirement per serving, it also delivers 15% of your daily Vitamin Dietary needs, making it an ideal choice for your family.


SUPER EASY TO DIGEST - So Good Almond Beverage is a plant-based, dairy-free beverage free of lactose and gluten, ensuring it's friendly for your digestive system.


ZERO PRESERVATIVES AND NO ADDED COLOURS - Almond Beverage from So Good is devoid of preservatives and added colours. It can be stored at ambient conditions for 365 days and is packaged in an environmentally friendly manner.


ENDLESS WAYS WITH SO GOOD: Whether sipped directly, added to your morning cereal or tea/coffee, blended into smoothies, or used to transform desserts into guilt-free indulgence, explore the endless ways to enjoy So Good Almond Beverage Chocolate.
Ingredients:
Water, Sugar, Almond (3%), Cocoa Powder (1%), Minerals, Natural Flavour Chocolate (Cocoa Extract, Caramel INS 150d), Emulsifier (INS 322), Stabiliser (INS 418), Edible Common Salt, Acidity Regulator (INS 500(ii)), Vitamins. All ingredients are of non-animal origin. Allergen statement: Contains Nuts (Almonds) (Processed in a factory that handles Dairy).

product_USP: Rich In Calcium & Vitamins, Dairy Free, No Preservatives, Gluten & Lactose Free
about_the_product:
About the Product:
So Good Almond Beverage Vanilla is a deliciously nutritious plant-based beverage made from the finest ingredients. It is Dairy-free, Lactose-free, and Gluten-free, making it an ideal choice for a healthy lifestyle. Drink it as is or add to your tea/coffee, cereal bowl, smoothies, or any other dish and explore the endless ways with this versatile drink. It's 50% lower in calories (compared to toned milk) and gives you 30% of your regular dietary requirement of calcium and 15% of vitamin (B series) per serving, making it THE SOGOOD beverage. Add it to your daily routine and FEELSOGOOD.


DELICIOUSLY NUTRITIOUS: So Good Almond Beverage Vanilla is made from the finest ingredients to give you the perfect combination of goodness and richness of almonds, with the deliciousness of vanilla.


ONE-STOP SOLUTION TO HEALTHY EATING: It has 50% fewer calories compared to regular toned milk, 40% less sugar compared to milkshakes, and has ~5 almonds per serve, making it a great choice for you and your family. Kickstart your mornings with our Almond Vanilla Beverage – a delightful blend of health and taste that ensures stress-free mornings for you and a nourishing treat for your kids.


HIGH IN CALCIUM AND VITAMINS- So Good Almond Beverage Vanilla is High in Calcium and a source of Vitamin B series and Vitamin D, making it a nutritional powerhouse. Calcium is something that is required on a daily basis, and So Good Almond Beverage provides 30% of your daily requirement of Calcium per serve. It also gives you 15% of your Vitamin Dietary requirement, making it an ideal choice for you and your family.


SUPER EASY TO DIGEST -So Good Almond beverage is a plant-based, dairy-free beverage that does not contain Lactose and Gluten, which makes it super friendly for your digestive system.


ZERO PRESERVATIVES AND NO ADDED COLOURS -Almond Beverage from So Good does not contain any preservatives and has no added colours. Moreover, it can be stored in ambient conditions for 365 days, and it comes in an Environment-Friendly Packaging.


ENDLESS WAYS WITH SO GOOD - Sip it directly or add to your morning bowl of cereal or tea/coffee, make smoothies, or transform your desserts into guilt-free indulgence explore the endless ways with So Good Almond Beverage Vanilla.
Ingredients:
Water, Sugar, Almond (3%), Minerals, Flavour (Natural Flavour), Emulsifier (Ins 322), Stabiliser (Ins 418), Edible Common Salt, Acidity Regulator (Ins 500(Ii)), Vitamins. All Ingredients Are Of Non-Animal Origin. Allergen Statement: Contains Nuts (Almonds) (Processed In A Factory That Handles Dairy)

product_desc: Moonfils - Strawberry Flavoured, Centre Filled Puff Rolls, Veg, Italian Recipe
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Bauli Moonfils are oven baked soft and delicious puff rolls. These are made from naturally leavened dough using traditional Italian baking techniques and are filled with rich crÃ¨me. These individually wrapped puff rolls stay fresh for much longer than most breads or cakes. This makes Bauli Moonfils the ideal ready to eat, anytime, on the go snack for adults and a perfect tiffin box companion for the younger ones in your family. Bauli is the authentic Italian cake maker since 1922, making holiday cakes and pastries for 100 years using only the highest quality ingredients. Bauli prides itself on having combined the skill of homemade recipes with high technology to bring authentic Italian baked goods and holiday products to your table. Bauli products are made with natural ingredients, through a process of natural leavening

About the Product:
Masala Tofu, also known as Soy Paneer, is a versatile ingredient ideal for various culinary creations. This plant-based protein source is crafted from high-quality soybeans, offering a firm texture and a rich flavour profile. It is perfect for adding to a range of dishes, from curries and stir-fries to salads and wraps.
How to Use:
Add small cubes of Tofu paneer straight into miso soups or salads. Cut the tofu into quarters, coat it lightly in potato starch, and fry to make Agedashi tofu. Roughly cut the masala tofu into chunks and add it to a stir fry, then mix vigorously into the rest of your ingredients with a spatula.

Simply use this as a spread on bread, to sauté vegetables or to prepare pasta, and transform the dish into a tasty delight. So go on and make a variety of dishes without worrying about health!

With no trans fat insight, this healthy spread removes all traces of empty calories and unnecessary cholesterol. It contains precious vitamins like A, E and D and is also rich in MUFA. It has a low quantity of saturated fats and does not have any hydrogenated fats at all!

It is a source of plant-based protein and essential amino acids required for a well-balanced diet. With 10g of protein per serving, it's an ideal choice for boosting protein intake without compromising taste or dietary preferences.


Whether you're an athlete, fitness enthusiast, or someone aiming for a healthier lifestyle, So Good Soy Beverage Protein+ offers a convenient and delicious way to meet your protein needs. Embrace a low-sugar, high-quality protein solution that aligns with your nutritional goals and dietary requirements. It's not just a beverage; it's a smart and nutritious choice for those prioritizing their well-being.


LOW-SUGAR FORMULATION - So Good Protein+ Soy Beverage is a unique low-sugar formulation made from high-quality NON-GMO whole soybean. Soybean is a low GI (glycemic index) product, making it suitable for managing blood sugar levels or following a diet prioritizing foods with a lower impact on blood sugar.


10 G PROTEIN PER SERVE – So Good Protein+ Soy Beverage has 10g of protein per serving, offering a convenient and delicious way to meet your protein needs. Whether you're an athlete, fitness enthusiast, or someone aiming for a healthier lifestyle, embrace this low-sugar, high-quality plant protein beverage to meet your dietary requirements.


SOURCE OF CALCIUM & VITAMINS - So Good Protein+ Soy Beverage is a source of calcium and Vitamin B series & D, making it a nutritional powerhouse. It’s also lactose and gluten-free, easy on your tummy.


ZERO PRESERVATIVES AND NO ADDED COLOURS - So Good Protein+ Soy Beverage does not contain any preservatives and has no added colours. Moreover, it can be stored in ambient conditions for 9 months and comes in environmentally friendly packaging.

product_desc: Mango Smoothie With Mango Chunks - Dairy Based Drink With Fruit
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Sunfeast Mango Smoothie with real mango chunks is a delicious combination of fruit and milk. It's made of real fruits and has no preservatives. The perfect drink to recharge you and lift your spirits when you are feeling low. It is low in fat and a healthy delicious alternative. It's easy to carry around too and can be taken to work or college. This delightful smoothie will satisfy your sweet tooth. It can be liked by all from young children to the elderly. Everyone can enjoy the taste of refreshing mango. Milk as we all know is a major source of calcium and helps in bone development. Mangoes too can offer significant health advantages thanks to their vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. Moreover, it is crucial for promoting bone health. Mangos are also a reliable source of vitamin C, which is necessary for the formation of healthy collagen and blood vessels as well as for wound healing. Mangoes are beneficial for maintaining your cardiovascular system as well. They are an excellent source of potassium and magnesium, both of which are linked to normal heartbeat and lower blood pressure. Mangiferin, a substance found in mangoes, is also a treatment for heart inflammation, according to preliminary research. Mangoes can support digestive system stabilisation as they provide dietary fibre and amylase chemicals, which help prevent constipation. Thus, hop onto Big Basket and order the smoothie right now and have it delivered to your home. Enjoy it with your friends and family and recharge yourself.
Ingredients:
Water, Milk Solids (33.5%), Sugar, Diced Totapari Mango (4.06%), Mandarine Pulp (4.06%), Alphonso Mango Pulp (2.18%), Totapari Mango Pulp (2.18%), Nata De Coco, Stabilizers (INS 466, INS 418), Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances, Artificial Flavouring Substances (Mango), Antioxidant (INS 300), Colours (INS 110, INS 102) And Vitamins.

About the Product:
We at Mooz manufacture, Fresh Cheese, also commonly known as soft cheese. Our cheese is handcrafted by an Italian cheese maker, from milk directly procured from farmers. It is suitable for vegetarians. Farmer-owned - care in every step, from cow to you. Bring the taste of Italy into your own kitchen with our mild and milky mozzarella cheese. Makes a delicious after-school or midnight snack or adds the perfect melt to a meatball sandwich or panini.

Pasteurized Milk, Culture, Salt, Garlic, Red Chilli, Paprika, Cumin, Parsley, Oregano, Black Pepper And Microbial Veg. Rennet

About the Product:
Shrikhand is a semi soft: sweetish sour: whole milk product prepared from lactic fermented curd. The curd (dahi) is partially strained through a cloth to remove the whey and thus produce a solid mass called chakka (the basic ingredient for Shrikhand). This chakka is mixed with the required amount of sugar: etc.: to yield Shrikhand.
Prepared from fresh curd: cream: Sugar and pasteurised which gives Amul Shrikhand Smooth: Tastier: Richer and uniform in texture.
Loose Shrikhand which is manufactured and marketed by Mithaiwalas / Halwai: who practically does not care for quality assurance and does not maintain hygienic standards; while Amul Shrikhand is made with the highest standard of quality and hygiene and is available at most reasonable price.
Tastier: Richer: Better Shrikhand: made out of quality ingredients.
Pasteurised before packing to ensure freedom from disease causing bacteria.
Hygienic: fully automated production process giving Shrikhand that is untouched by human hand.
Highest standard of quality and hygiene ensured at the most state of the art plant at Sugar Dairy: Baroda & Sabar Dairy: Himatnagar.
Amul Shrikhand is available in convenient to use cups as it is packed in four consumer pack-sizes.
Consumer has freedom to choose from four pack-sizes while on tour or on picnic or any time at home to serve the guests on special occasions.Consistent quality provided with assurance of Amul brand name.

About the Product:
Amul Srikhand Badam Pista is a semi-soft sweetly sour product prepared from lactic fermented curd is quite popular in the north and western part of India, and is normally served as a dessert. This tasty and delightful combination of cream, new curd, sugar and pasteurized milk; the taste is rich and it leaves a soft creamy touch on the palate. The Srikhand becomes more flavourful with the subtle touches of pista and badam (variations of nuts).
Ingredients:
Srikhand is made of chakka, sugar, pista, badam, condiments and different spices. The curd, after it is partially strained through a cloth to remove the whey, produces a solid mass known as chakka.
Benefits:
This tasty traditional Indian sweet can be eaten with rotis or chapattis. If you really want to savour the taste of Srikhand, you have to serve it chilled. As Amul Srikhand has a long shelf life, it can be easily kept in the refrigerator for long, and served as a dessert after a hearty meal.

About the Product:
Prepare delicious paneer recipes whenever the craving strikes with this ready-to-cook malai paneer from one of India's most loved and trusted dairy brands, Amul. It's the easiest way to cook paneer and provides protein and calcium. So if you're a big paneer fan, make sure you always have it stocked in your refrigerator! This ready-to-cook malai paneer from Amul is similar to cream cottage cheese. It's available diced in 100 grams, 200 grams, 500 grams, and 1 kg packaging, and in block form in 200 grams and 1 kg packaging. Amul Malai Paneer has a higher fat content and lower moisture content compared to loose paneer available in the market. This makes it easy to cook in less time, making it perfect for students and young professionals who don't always have too much time. Opt for the diced packet of Amul Malai Paneer if you like to have a sense of uniformity when you're cooking. It has a smooth, soft, and uniform texture. Amul Malai Paneer is made from pure and hygienic sources and has a shelf life of up to six months when stored frozen.
How to Use:
Paneer is a staple food item for vegetarians who get their protein from this milk-based cottage cheese. It has a mild milky flavour and a dense texture which goes extremely well with strong spices in classic Indian dishes. Apart from gravy items commonly found in North Indian vegetarian spread, chunks of paneer can also be used in soups and curries. |
